summary: Profile completion UI customization: replace 1–5 star level system with a 'Categoría' selector from 1era to 7ma.

existing_features.title: Update the profile completion (Profile Setup) form to use a "Category" selector with values from "1era" through "7ma" instead of the current 1–5 level selector.
Update the Edit Profile form to use the same "Category (1era–7ma)" selector (no stars, no 1–5 level wording).
Replace the star-based category/level display in profile cards and profile screen so it shows the selected category label (e.g., "3era") instead of rendering 1–5 stars.
Update frontend type bindings/usages so the app compiles and the profile create/update flows work end-to-end with the new 7-value category enum.

new_feature_requests.summary: In the profile completion screen, replace the 1–5 star level system with a 'Categoría' option ranging from 1era to 7ma.
Update the backend profile model to support seven category values (1era–7ma) instead of five level values, and ensure create/update profile endpoints accept and store the new range.

projectName: Replace 1–5 star level with Category (1era–7ma) in profile setup and profile display
